project_abstract.cdata: The Integrated Regional Health Development Project comprises the establishment of health regions at Jinhua, Jiujiang, and Baoji to experiment with new ways to improve capability for planning and delivery of health services by establishing policy criteria and systems for financing investment in the regions and supporting investments in the provincial capitals. The regional and provincial project components are: (i) health planning, management and reform; (ii) disease prevention and surveillance; (iii) health education; (iv) maternal and child health services; (v) emergency services; (vi) hospital services; (vii) rehabilitative medical services; (viii) medical education and training; and (ix) equipment management. Medical education, health education, and emergency service investments at the provincial level will receive additional support beyond that needed to just support the project region. A national component to strengthen the capability of the Ministry of Public Health to guide, assess and replicate the project and to begin to deal with issues which transcend the provincial and local levels is also being supported by the project.

P003483.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>综合性区域卫生发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的内容包括：（1）建立金华、九江和宝鸡卫生区域，试点采用新方法，通过在三地制定投融资政策标准和制度，提高三地卫生服务规划和供给能力；（2）支持省会城市投资。项目设有以下子项目：（1）卫生规划、管理和改革子项目；（2）疾病预防监测子项目；（3）健康教育子项目；（4）妇幼保健服务子项目；（5）急救服务子项目；（6）医院服务子项目；（7）康复医疗服务子项目；（8）医学教育和培训子项目；（9）设备管理子项目。除了仅向项目区提供的资助外，省级医学教育、健康教育和急救服务投资还将得到额外资助。此外，项目还设有中央子项目，旨在增强卫生部在以下两方面的能力：（1）对本项目予以指导、评价和推广复制；（2）着手处理省级和地方共同面临的问题。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
